messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: URGENT!!! Need Homeschool Letters to Harper'...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Very cool, I just have to get a user ID and password from my library to access it online!  Thanks Norma! ~Aimee [Non-text portions of this message have
messages.messageBody:
tessimal@... writes:
> You can get a copy of this article free from the EBSCOhost Web
> database for periodicals to which most libraries subscribe. I was
> able to access it via my home computer through our library system's
> web site. If you don't know how to do this (I didn't) phone or visit
> your library and they will usually be happy to help you. It was very
> easy.
>
> Norma
>


Very cool, I just have to get a user ID and password from my library to
access it online! Thanks Norma!

~Aimee


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
